sentences.sContent: The plants are as dry as tinder after this long drought.
sentences.sContent_eng: The plants are as dry as tinder after this long drought.
sentences.sCn: 植物经过长期干旱之后干枯得如同火绒一般。

sentences.sContent: Before the strike anywhere match was invented people used tinder boxes.
sentences.sContent_eng: Before the strike anywhere match was invented people used tinder boxes.
sentences.sCn: 在万能火柴发明之前，人们用的是火绒匣。

remMethod.val: tind(点燃)+er → 用于点火的东西 → 火绒

words.tran: 易燃物；火绒箱；容易生气的人；潜伏着暴乱或战争危险的人

trans.tranOther: dry material that burns easily and can be used for lighting fires
